      • DeviceExists

        public boolean DeviceExists(java.lang.String mHost,
                   java.lang.String field)
        Look into database for existing devices, this function is not key sensitive.
        Parameters:
        mHost, - contains the key to be searched in the device database
        field, - contain the field name to look for could be "host" or "name"
        Returns:
        true if device exists, false if device does not exists

      • hasDevices

        public boolean hasDevices()
        To query table devices in database to know if it is empty or not
        Returns:
        false if empty, true if at least there is one device in devices table
